मिस्ट्री शॉप लक रॉयल टैब में एक इन-गेम इवेंट है जो यूजर्स को आइटम पर भारी छूट प्रदान करता है. छूट अलग-अलग होती है और आश्वासन दिया जाता है कि सभी यूजर्स को एक समान ऑफर मिलेंगे. ऑफ़र अलग-अलग होते हैं और यूजर्स को रैंडम रूप से दिए जाते हैं. इस तरह एक प्लेयर 90% तक छूट पा सकता है जबकि दूसरे यूजर को इससे कम छूट मिल सकती है. ऑफ़र आमतौर पर केवल 7 दिनों के लिए वैध होता है जब तक कि कहा न जाए और एक बार खत्म होने पर ये ख़त्म हो जाएगा.

अगर आप ऑफ़र से चूक गए या सेल में ऑफ़र या आइटम आपकी पसंद के अनुसार नहीं है, तो साथ में ही हमेशा और इवेंट चल रहे होते हैं और कभी भी आपके क्लाइंट में मिस्ट्री शॉप वापस आ सकती है.

1260804036870.name: [Hindi] गयाब आइटम (Missing Items)
1260804036870.title: [Hindi] गयाब आइटम (Missing Items)
1260804036870.body:
Free Fire आइटम रिकवरी की पेशकश नहीं करता है और यूजर्स की गलती के कारण आइटम के खोने के लिए किसी भी अनुरोध पर विचार नहीं किया जाएगा.

यदि कोई आइटम आपके खाते से अचानक गायब हो गया है, तो बस एक रिक्वेस्ट सबमिट करें और निम्न जानकारी प्रदान करें;

  • प्लेयर ID:
  • गेम में नाम:
  • रीजन:
  • आइटम का सटीक नाम:
  • रकम:
  • तारीख़ जब आपने पिछली बार आइटम देखा:
  • तारीख़ जब आपको पता चला कि आइटम गायब है:

ईवेंट के इनाम न मिलने पर, कृपया समस्या के प्रकार के रूप में ईवेंट में समस्या (इवेंट से गायब इनाम सहित) चुनें और आवश्यक जानकारी भरें.

देरी से बचने के लिए, ऊपर बताई गई सभी जानकारी प्रदान करें और आइटम गयाब होने के 72 घंटों के भीतर रिपोर्ट भेजें. हम इस बात की गारंटी नहीं दे सकते हैं कि आपके गयाब आइटम को बरामद किया जाएगा या नहीं और यह जांच पर आधारित होगा. आइटम गयाब होने के लिए 5 कार्य दिवस तक लग सकते हैं.

जानबूझकर गलत रिपोर्ट भेजने से अकाउंट ससपेंड हो सकता है.

1260804036850.name: [Hindi] मैं मैच खत्म होने के बाद गोल्ड नहीं मिल रहा (I'm not earning gold after the match ends)
1260804036850.title: [Hindi] मैं मैच खत्म होने के बाद गोल्ड नहीं मिल रहा (I'm not earning gold after the match ends)
1260804036850.body:
आप एक दिन में ज़्यादा से ज़्यादा 800 गोल्ड पा सकते हैं. एकबार मानक पर पहुंचने के बाद, आप और गोल्ड नहीं पा सकते.

हर मैच के बाद, आप एक दिन में मिले गोल्ड की मात्रा देख सकते हैं. उदाहरण के लिए, [125/800] का मतलब है कि आपने 125 गोल्ड पाए और 675 और गोल्ड पा सकते हैं.

1260804023750.name: [Hindi] रैंक सिस्टम (Rank System)
1260804023750.title: [Hindi] रैंक सिस्टम (Rank System)
1260804023750.body:
रैंक और RP कैलकुलेशन का नया रूप

“रैंक मोड में हमारा लक्ष्य हमेशा प्लेयर्स को अपने कौशल का प्रदर्शन करने के लिए उचित और प्रतिस्पर्धी माहौल देना है. अभी, RP कैलकुलेशन सिस्टम हाई रैंक वाले प्लेयर्स के लिए ऊपर आना वास्तव में कठिन बनाती है. इस वर्शन में, हम हाई रैंक वाले प्लेयर्स के लिए RP के नुकसान को कम कर रहे हैं ताकि वे टॉप आसानी से जा सकें. इसके अलावा, हमने महसूस किया कि वास्तव में हीरोइक रैंक के भीतर प्लेयर्स के बीच बड़ा कौशल अंतर है, इसलिए हम एक ग्रैंडमास्टर टियर जोड़ रहे हैं, जिसमें उच्च स्तर में प्रतिस्पर्धा और सक्रियता बढ़ाने के लिए प्रत्येक रीजन में केवल 300 स्पॉट हैं. "

हर रीजन के टॉप 300 प्लेयर्स को प्रतिदिन "ग्रैंडमास्टर" में रखा जाएगा.

रैंक अप करने के लिए कितने रैंक पॉइंट चाहिए यह देखने के लिए आप नीचे दी गई टेबल का संदर्भ ले सकते हैं:

1260804059649.name: [Hindi] आज मेरा जन्मदिन है, क्या मुझे कुछ मुफ़्त डायमंड मिल सकते हैं? (It's my birthday, can I get some free diamonds?)
1260804059649.title: [Hindi] आज मेरा जन्मदिन है, क्या मुझे कुछ मुफ़्त डायमंड मिल सकते हैं? (It's my birthday, can I get some free diamonds?)
1260804059649.body:
हम ज़्यादा से ज़्यादा आपके अनुरोध को पूरा करना चाहते हैं, हमें मुफ्त आइटम देने की अनुमति नहीं है. यह अन्य यूजर्स के लिए अनुचित होगा और Free Fire में पहले से ही इन-गेम इवेंट हैं जो न केवल डायमंड, बल्कि मुफ़्त आइटम भी देते हैं.

हम आपको इवेंट में भाग लेने का सुझाव देते हैं और अधिक जानकारी के लिए गेम में आप इवेंट टैब पर जा सकते हैं.

1260804671429.name: [Hindi] CS रैंक AFK (CS Rank AFK)
1260804671429.title: [Hindi] CS रैंक AFK (CS Rank AFK)
1260804671429.body:
डिअर सर्वाइवर्स,

हमने "CS रैंक AFK" मैसेज के बारे में आपके सवाल मिले हैं. इसलिए हम इस पर कुछ जानकारी देना चाहते

शर्तें

1. यदि आप Free Fire से डिस्कनेक्ट होते हैं और सफलतापूर्वक 120 सेकंड में फिर से कनेक्ट करते हैं, तो कोई जुर्माना नहीं होगा.

2. यदि आप Free Fire से डिस्कनेक्ट होते हैं और 120 सेकंड के बाद फिर से कनेक्ट करते हैं, तो आपका CS रैंक मैच हार के रूप में गिना जाएगा, भले ही आपकी टीम मैच जीत जाएं. आपका अकाउंट 1 AFK काउंट के साथ भी मार्क किया जाएगा.

3. यदि आप गेम में ऑनलाइन हैं, लेकिन 120 सेकंड से अधिक के लिए कुछ नहीं करते, तो आपका CS रैंक मैच एक हार के रूप में गिना जाएगा, भले ही आपकी टीम मैच जीत जाए. आपका अकाउंट 1 AFK काउंट के साथ भी मार्क किया जाएगा.

नतीजा

जब आपका अकाउंट को 3 या अधिक AFK के रूप में मार्क किया जाता है, तो AFK चेतावनी मेल आपको भेजा जाएगा.

जब आपके अकाउंट को 8 AFK काउंट के रूप में मार्क किया जाता है, तो आपको CS रैंक मोड खेलने से प्रतिबंधित कर दिया जाएगा.

उपाय

जब भी आप किसी भी AFK के बिना CS कैज़ुअल मैच या CS रैंक मैच खेलते हैं, तो आपके अकाउंट की AFK गिनती 1 से कम हो जाएगी.

जब तक आपके अकाउंट की AFK गिनती 8 से नीचे है, तब तक आपको CS रैंक मोड खेलने की अनुमति होगी.

1260807606809.name: Special Airdrop Not Received
1260807606809.title: Special Airdrop Not Received
1260807606809.body:
Special Airdrops (Special Boxes in the lobby) are promotional items that can appear after any game and are available for 24 hours for purchase. They are randomly offered to all players if you saw some Special Airdrop offer, do not expect to get exactly the same Special Airdrop in the future.

Special Airdrops are available on the right side, at the bottom of the screen (as shown in the example below), and can be purchased through AppStore or GooglePlay.

It is always important to make sure the payment was completed successfully. After successful payment, you will receive a confirmation email.

If you have purchased one or more Special Airdrops, they will be sent to your Vault directly within 48 hours after purchase. If you bought 2 or more Special Airdrops and one of them already received, you may need to wait for receiving the other one. 

 

If you've already waited for 48-hours and the Special Airdrop hasn't arrived, simply contact our Customer Service Team. You can also read our guide on How to Submit a Ticket for Special Airdrop Issues.

1260807326349.name: Negative Diamonds and Refunded Transactions
1260807326349.title: Negative Diamonds and Refunded Transactions
1260807326349.body:
For accounts with Negative Diamonds, it is due to refunded transactions and will have to top up the negative diamonds to remove the restriction.

Depending on what transaction was refunded, the exact amount of diamonds or equivalent will be deducted from the account.

 

To check which transaction was refunded, check your email linked to the account you used to purchase.

E.g. For Refunded transactions in Google Store, log in to your email linked to your Google Play account and search for your Google Play Order Cancellation Receipt 

You can also check your Order History in Google (https://play.google.com/store/account/orderhistory)

 

For iOS:

  1. Go to Settings > [your name] > iTunes & App Store.
  2. Tap your Apple ID, then tap View Apple ID. You might be asked to sign in with your Apple ID.
  3. If you use Family Sharing, you’ll see in your purchase history what you bought using your Apple ID, but you won’t see what other family members bought. To see what other family members bought, sign in with their Apple ID.
  4. Swipe up to Purchase History and tap it.

 

NOTE:

Any account with negative diamonds must top-up the required amount shown in the message to remove the restriction regardless of who asked for the refund.

Like any online game, purchased items such as diamonds or Airdrops can sometimes be delayed. In any event that you still haven't received the item/s after 24 hours, simply contact our Customer Service Team and do not ask for a refund from Google or Appstore to avoid diamond restriction.

1260805458049.name: How to Find Your Codashop Receipt
1260805458049.title: How to Find Your Codashop Receipt
1260805458049.body:
To be able to receive a confirmation email from Codashop, you need to input your email in this field during purchase.

After you buy diamonds via Codashop, you’ll get a confirmation email that you can use as a receipt. You can find your Transaction ID on this receipt.

If you can’t find your confirmation email, contact Codashop support directly to get a transaction history: https://support.in.codapayments.com/hc/en-us/articles/360003903975-How-Can-I-Get-a-History-of-My-Transactions-

360038861233.name: The Currency I Pay Is Not Correct. How to Change It (Google)
360038861233.title: The Currency I Pay Is Not Correct. How to Change It (Google)
360038861233.body:
The currency that the in-game shop charges is set by the app store and the settings on your app store account. We are therefore unable to control the currency you are presented with directly and this must be changed in your account settings. The process of this can vary depending on your device and app store.
 
To change your country settings with a Google Play based device follow these steps:
  • Sign in to your Google Payments account by visiting payments.google.com.
  • Click Settings in the left panel.
  • Click Edit next to the Home Address listed and update the address.
  • Open the Play Store and navigate to any item available for download.
  • Click to begin a download until you reach the "Accept and buy" screen (no need to complete the purchase).
  • Close the Play Store, force stop and then clear data for the Google Play Store application (Settings > Apps > Google Play Store > Force Stop then Clear Data) or clear your browser cache.
  • Re-open the Play Store. You should now see the Play Store that matches your default payment method’s billing country.
For any issues during this process please contact Google Play Support.

360037757614.name: How to Submit a Ticket for Special Airdrop Issues
360037757614.title: How to Submit a Ticket for Special Airdrop Issues
360037757614.body:
For missing Special Airdrop or purchased twice or more, please choose Payment Issue (Special Airdrop not received) as "type of problem".

For "Description and details", provide a short explanation of what happened to help us identify what caused the issue.

Provide all your account information and type in the Google Play receipt number.

On "Select accordingly", choose the option that fits your problem.

E.g. You purchased 4 Special Package but only received one, so select the last option "Bought Special Airdrop thrice or more".

Lastly, attach a copy of all GP receipts.

Please provide all the required information to avoid delays and processing time may take up to 3 business days upon submission of all the required information.

360034095093.name: How to Fix “In-App Purchase Not Allowed” Message (iOS)
360034095093.title: How to Fix “In-App Purchase Not Allowed” Message (iOS)
360034095093.body:
To enable in-app purchases, you need to turn on Screen Time:

  1. Go to Settings > Screen Time, then tap Turn on Screen Time.
  2. Tap Continue, then choose "This is My [device]" or "This is My Child's [device]."
    • If you're the parent or guardian of your device and want to prevent another family member from changing your settings, tap Use Screen Time Passcode to create a passcode. Then re-enter the passcode to confirm.
    • If you're setting up Screen Time on your child's device, follow the prompts until you get to Parent Passcode and enter a passcode. Re-enter the passcode to confirm. 
  3. Tap Content & Privacy Restrictions. If asked, enter your passcode, then turn on Content & Privacy. 
  4. Tap iTunes & App Store Purchases.
  5. Tap In-app Purchases and set to Allow.

You can also go to Settings > Screen Time > Content & Privacy Restrictions, and tap Allowed Apps. Then deselect iTunes Store and Books.

If the problem persists, please contact Apple Support https://support.apple.com/

360025823174.name: What to Do If You Haven't Received Diamonds
360025823174.title: What to Do If You Haven't Received Diamonds
360025823174.body:
For Codashop and Codapay users, please refer to our guide on CodaShop Payment Issues.

It is always important to make sure the payment has been completed. To check, log in your email and see if you received the payment receipt, as shown in the examples below:

Check the receipt to ensure that the purchase was completed or successful.

Depending on the payment option used, the diamonds may take some time to appear in your account. It usually takes a few seconds to a few minutes depending on the payment gateway you used to purchase the diamonds.

If the diamonds are still missing from your account after 20 minutes, try to simulate another purchase by:

  1. Press the "Top-up" button again and select any amount.
  2. After you enter the page that required the password, don't complete any transaction and press cancel or previous page button immediately.
  3. When you return to the main page, please wait for 1-2 minutes and restart Free Fire. The amount of diamonds should increase soon.

If the diamonds still does not appear in your account, contact our customer support by submitting a request. You can also read our guide on How to submit a ticket for diamonds not received?

360025823214.name: How to Submit a Ticket for Diamonds Not Received
360025823214.title: How to Submit a Ticket for Diamonds Not Received
360025823214.body:
Before submitting a request for missing diamonds, make sure that you read our guide on What to do when you did not receive your Diamonds?

For diamonds not received, our customer support agents will need the following information:

  • Player ID:

         To find your player ID, simply click on your name and can find the ID below your in-game name.

         

  • In-game Name:
  • Region:
  • Screenshot of your Payment receipt:

         The payment receipt is sent out automatically to your email and below is an example of a Google               Play receipt.

         Google Play Receipt:

         

 

Please provide all the required information to avoid delays and processing time may take up to 3 business days upon submission of all the required information.

360026169173.name: How to Find Your Google Receipt
360026169173.title: How to Find Your Google Receipt
360026169173.body:
After you buy something on the Google Store, you’ll get a confirmation email that you can use as a receipt. You can find your order number on this receipt.

If you can’t find your confirmation email, you can get a receipt online:

  1. Visit pay.google.com/ and sign in with your Google account.
  2. On the left, click Activity
  3. You'll see transaction history and look for the receipt

360025823234.name: How to Make a Refund
360025823234.title: How to Make a Refund
360025823234.body:
All purchases are final and non-refundable. We can, however, process a 1-time refund for the wrong amount of diamonds purchased. The account must have the exact number of diamonds to be refunded.

To submit a request for a refund for the wrong amount of diamonds purchased, you will need to provide the following:

  • Player ID:
  • In-game Name:
  • Region:
  • Screenshot of your Payment receipt:

Please note that we shall only issue a 1-time refund for the wrong amount of diamonds purchased and reserve the right to refuse further reimbursements. We do not wish to encourage career victims, nor will we penalize players who legitimately make the occasional slip-up.

Processing time may take up to 5 business days upon submission of all the required information.

DISCLAIMER: We reserve the right to decline a refund and can only refund purchases made via Google Play. A request must be submitted within the same day to qualify as an accidental purchase.

360026027774.name: CodaShop Payment Issues
360026027774.title: CodaShop Payment Issues
360026027774.body:
For Codashop completed purchase/s but didn’t get the diamonds, you need to contact their Customer Support.

You can reach them and make a report at the links below:

Bangladesh https://support.bd.codapayments.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
India https://support.in.codapayments.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
Pakistan https://support.pk.codapayments.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Make sure you provide all the information requested and may refer to this article for more information:

https://codapayment.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/360001939295-How-to-contact-Codashop-customer-support

4402484917658.name: [Hindi] स्पेशल एयरड्रॉप नहीं मिला (Special Airdrop Not Received)
4402484917658.title: [Hindi] स्पेशल एयरड्रॉप नहीं मिला (Special Airdrop Not Received)
4402484917658.body:
स्पेशल एयरड्रॉप्स (लॉबी में स्पेशल बॉक्स) प्रमोशनल आइटम हैं जो किसी भी गेम के बाद दिखाई दे सकते हैं और खरीद के लिए 24 घंटे उपलब्ध होते हैं. वे सभी प्लेयर्स को रैंडम रूप से दिए जाते हैं. अगर आपको कुछ स्पेशल एयरड्रॉप मिले हैं, तो भविष्य में बिल्कुल वैसा ही विशेष एयरड्रॉप मिलने की उम्मीद न करें.

स्पेशल एयरड्रॉप स्क्रीन के नीचे दाईं ओर उपलब्ध हैं (जैसा कि नीचे दिए गए उदाहरण में दिखाया गया है), और इसे AppStore या GooglePlay के माध्यम से खरीदा जा सकता है.

यह सुनिश्चित करना हमेशा महत्वपूर्ण होता है कि पेमेंट सफलतापूर्वक पूरा किया गया. सफल पेमेंट के बाद, आपको एक कन्फर्मेशन का ईमेल प्राप्त होगा.

यदि आपने एक या अधिक स्पेशल एयरड्रॉप खरीदे हैं, तो वे खरीद के 48 घंटों के भीतर सीधे आपकी वॉल्ट में भेज दिए जाएंगे. यदि आपने 2 या ज़्यादा स्पेशल एयरड्रॉप खरीदे हैं और उनमें से एक पहले ही मिल चुका है, तो हो सकता है दूसरा मिलने के लिए आपको थोड़ा इंतज़ार करना पड़े.

यदि आप पहले ही 48 घंटे तक इंतज़ार कर चुके हैं और स्पेशल एयरड्रॉप नहीं आया है, तो हमारी ग्राहक सेवा टीम से संपर्क करें. आप हमारे गाइड को भी पढ़ सकते हैं कि स्पेशल एयरड्रॉप की समस्या के लिए टिकट कैसे सबमिट करें: [Hindi] स्पेशल एयरड्रॉप समस्यायों के लिए टिकेट सबमिट कैसे करें (How to Submit a Ticket for Special Airdrop Issues).

1260807437270.name: [Hindi] नेगेटिव डायमंड और रिफंड किए ट्रांजैक्शन (Negative Diamonds and Refunded Transactions)
1260807437270.title: [Hindi] नेगेटिव डायमंड और रिफंड किए ट्रांजैक्शन (Negative Diamonds and Refunded Transactions)
1260807437270.body:
नेगेटिव डायमंड वाले अकाउंट के लिए, यह रिफंड किए ट्रांजैक्शन के कारण होता है और प्रतिबंध को हटाने के लिए नेगेटिव डायमंड को टॉप अप करना होगा.

किस ट्रांजैक्शन के आधार पर किये गए रिफंड के हिसाब से, डायमंड या उसके बराबर की राशि अकाउंट से काट ली जाएगी.

 

यह देखने के लिए कि कौनसा ट्रांजैक्शन रिफंड हुआ है, उस अकाउंट से लिंक अपना ईमेल देखें जिसे आपने खरीदारी की है.

उदाहरण: अगर रिफंड किया ट्रांज़ैक्शन Google Store में हुआ है, तो अपने Google Play अकाउंट से जुड़े अपने ईमेल में लॉग इन करें और अपनी Google Play आर्डर के रद्द होने की रसीद खोजें

आप Google में भी ऑर्डर हिस्ट्री देख सकते हैं

(https://play.google.com/store/account/orderhistory)

 

iOS के लिए:

  1. Settings > [your name] > iTunes & App Store पर जाएं
  2. अपनी Apple ID पर टैप करें,उसके बाद View Apple ID पर टैप करें. हो सकता आप से आपकी Apple ID साइन इन करने के लिए कहा जाए.
  3. अगर आप Family Sharing का इस्तेमाल कर रहे हैं, तो आप अपनी Apple ID की खरीद की हिस्ट्री देख सकते हैं, लेकिन अगर आपके परिवार के सदस्य ने इसे ख़रीदा है तो आप नहीं देख सकते. इसके लिए आपको उनकी Apple ID से साइन इन करना होगा.


नोट:

नेगेटिव डायमंड वाले किसी भी अकाउंट को प्रतिबंध से हटाने के लिए मैसेज में दिखाई गई आवश्यक राशि का टॉप-अप करना चाहिए, भले ही रिफंड के लिए कहा हो.

किसी भी ऑनलाइन गेम की तरह, खरीदे गए आइटम जैसे डायमंड या एयरड्रॉप में कभी-कभी देरी हो सकती है. किसी भी इवेंट में जिसमें आपको 24 घंटों के बाद भी आइटम नहीं मिले हैं, उसके लिए बस हमारी कस्टमर सर्विस टीम से संपर्क करें और डायमंड प्रतिबंध से बचने के लिए Google या Appstore से रिफंड के लिए न कहें.

1260806943469.name: [Hindi] अपनी Codashop रसीद कैसे खोजेंगे (How to Find Your Codashop Receipt)
1260806943469.title: [Hindi] अपनी Codashop रसीद कैसे खोजेंगे (How to Find Your Codashop Receipt)
1260806943469.body:
Codashop से एक पुष्टिकरण ईमेल प्राप्त करने के लिए, आपको खरीदारी के दौरान इस फ़ील्ड में अपना ईमेल इनपुट करना होगा.

Codashop के माध्यम से डायमंड खरीदने के बाद, आपको एक पुष्टिकरण ईमेल प्राप्त होगा जिसे आप रसीद के रूप में उपयोग कर सकते हैं. आप इस रसीद पर अपना ट्रांजेक्शन आईडी देख सकते हैं.

यदि आपको अपना पुष्टिकरण ईमेल नहीं मिल रहा है, तो ट्रांजेक्शन हिस्ट्री प्राप्त करने के लिए सीधे Codashop सहायता से संपर्क करें: https://support.in.codapayments.com/hc/en-us/articles/360003903975-How-Can-I-Get-a-History-of-My-Transactions-

1500005010722.name: [Hindi] जिस करेंसी में मुझे भुगतान करना है वो सही नहीं है. इसे कैसे चेंज किया जाए(Google) (The Currency I Pay Is Not Correct. How to Change It (Google))
1500005010722.title: [Hindi] जिस करेंसी में मुझे भुगतान करना है वो सही नहीं है. इसे कैसे चेंज किया जाए(Google) (The Currency I Pay Is Not Correct. How to Change It (Google))
1500005010722.body:
इन-गेम शॉप में करेंसी ऐप स्टोर और आपके ऐप स्टोर अकाउंट की सेटिंग्स द्वारा निर्धारित की जाती है. इसलिए हम आपकी करेंसी को सीधे नियंत्रित करने में असमर्थ हैं और इसे आपकी खाता सेटिंग में परिवर्तित किया जा सकता है. इसकी प्रक्रिया आपके डिवाइस और ऐप स्टोर के आधार पर भिन्न हो सकती है.

Google Play आधारित डिवाइस के साथ अपने देश की सेटिंग बदलने के लिए इन स्टेप का पालन करें:

  1. payments.google.com पर जाकर अपने Google पेमेंट अकाउंट में साइन इन करें.
  2. बाएं पैनल में सेटिंग पर क्लिक करें.
  3. होम एड्रेस के सामने एडिट पर क्लिक करें और एड्रेस अपडेट करें.
  4. Play Store खोलें और डाउनलोड के लिए उपलब्ध किसी भी आइटम पर नेविगेट करें.
  5. डाउनलोड शुरू करने के लिए क्लिक करें जब तक आप "एक्सेप्ट और बाय" स्क्रीन तक नहीं पहुंचते (खरीद को पूरा करने की कोई आवश्यकता नहीं).
  6. Google Play Store एप्लिकेशन के लिए प्ले स्टोर, फोर्स स्टॉप करें और फिर डेटा को साफ़ करें (सेटिंग> ऐप्स> Google Play Store> फोर्स स्टॉप करें और डेटा क्लियर करें) या अपने ब्राउज़र का कैश क्लियर करें.
  7. Play Store को फिर से खोलें. अब आपको ऐसा प्ले स्टोर दिखना चाहिए जो आपके डिफ़ॉल्ट पेमेंट विधि के बिलिंग कन्ट्री से मेल खाता है.

इस प्रक्रिया के दौरान किसी भी समस्या के लिए कृपया Google Play सपोर्ट से संपर्क करें.

1500005010462.name: [Hindi] स्पेशल एयरड्रॉप समस्यायों के लिए टिकेट सबमिट कैसे करें (How to Submit a Ticket for Special Airdrop Issues)
1500005010462.title: [Hindi] स्पेशल एयरड्रॉप समस्यायों के लिए टिकेट सबमिट कैसे करें (How to Submit a Ticket for Special Airdrop Issues)
1500005010462.body:
मिसिंग स्पेशल एयरड्रॉप के लिए या दो बार या अधिक खरीदे जाने के लिए, कृपया "समस्या का प्रकार" के रूप में पेमेंट समस्या (स्पेशल एयरड्रॉप प्राप्त नहीं) चुनें.

"डिस्क्रिप्शन और डिटेल" के लिए, इस बात का संक्षिप्त विवरण प्रदान करें कि क्या हुआ जिससे समस्या के कारण की पहचान करने में हमारी मदद हो सके.

अपने अकाउंट की पूरी जानकारी प्रदान करें और Google Play रसीद संख्या दें.

"अपने हिसाब से चुनें" पर, उस विकल्प को चुनें जो आपकी समस्या के लिए सही बैठता है.

जैसे आपने 4 स्पेशल पैकेज खरीदे, लेकिन केवल एक ही प्राप्त हुआ, तो अंतिम विकल्प "स्पेशल एयरड्रॉप तीन बार या इससे अधिक खरीदा गया" चुनें.

अंत में, GP रसीद की सभी कॉपी अटैच करें.

कृपया विलंब से बचने के लिए सभी आवश्यक जानकारी प्रदान करें और सभी आवश्यक जानकारी सबमिट करने के बाद 3 बिज़नेस डे तक लग सकते हैं.

1500005001382.name: [Hindi] "ऐप में खरीदारी की अनुमति नहीं" मैसेज (iOS) की समस्या कैसे हल करें (How to Fix “In-App Purchase Not Allowed” Message (iOS))
1500005001382.title: [Hindi] "ऐप में खरीदारी की अनुमति नहीं" मैसेज (iOS) की समस्या कैसे हल करें (How to Fix “In-App Purchase Not Allowed” Message (iOS))
1500005001382.body:
ऐप में खरीदारी करने के लिए, स्क्रीन टाइम को चालू करें:

1. सेटिंग में जाएं>स्क्रीन टाइम, फिर स्क्रीन टाइम चालू करें पर टैप करें.

2. जारी रखें पर टैप करें, फिर "यह मेरी [डिवाइस] है" या "यह मेरे बच्चे की [डिवाइस] है" चुनें.

  • अगर आप माता-पिता या अभिभावक हैं और परिवार के किसी अन्य सदस्य को अपनी डिवाइस की सेटिंग बदलने से रोकना चाहते हैं, तो पासकोड बनाने के लिए स्क्रीन टाइम पासकोड का उपयोग करें पर टैप करें. फिर कन्फर्म करने के लिए पासकोड फिर से दर्ज करें.
  • अगर आप अपने बच्चे की डिवाइस पर स्क्रीन टाइम सेट कर रहे हैं, तो निर्देशों का पालन करें जब तक कि आप पेरेंट पासकोड प्राप्त न कर लें और पासकोड दर्ज न कर लें. कन्फर्म करने के लिए पासकोड फिर से दर्ज करें.

3. कॉन्टेंट और प्राइवेसी प्रतिबंध पर टैप करें. अगर पूछा जाए, तो अपना पासकोड दर्ज करें, फिर कॉन्टेंट और प्राइवेसी को चालू करें.

4. iTunes & App Store खरीदारी पर टैप करें.

5. ऐप में खरीदारी पर टैप करें और अनुमति दें.

आप सेटिंग में भी जा सकते हैं > स्क्रीन टाइम > कॉन्टेंट & प्राइवेसी प्रतिबंध, और अनुमति मिले हुए ऐप पर टैप करें. फिर iTunes Store और बुक को डिसेलेक्ट करें.

अगर समस्या बनी रहती है, तो कृपया Apple स्पोर्ट https://support.apple.com पर संपर्क करें.

1500004903061.name: [Hindi] अगर आपको डायमंड नहीं प्राप्त हुए तो क्या करें (What to Do If You Haven't Received Diamonds)
1500004903061.title: [Hindi] अगर आपको डायमंड नहीं प्राप्त हुए तो क्या करें (What to Do If You Haven't Received Diamonds)
1500004903061.body:
Codashop और Codapay के यूजर, कृपया CodaShop पेमेंट समस्याओं पर हमारे गाइड से जानकारी लें.

यह सुनिश्चित करना हमेशा ज़रूरी है कि पेमेंट पूरा हो गया है. जांच करने के लिए, अपने ईमेल में लॉग इन करें और देखें कि क्या आपको पेमेंट रसीद प्राप्त हुई है, जैसा कि नीचे दिए गए उदाहरणों में दिखाया गया है:

यह सुनिश्चित करने के लिए कि खरीद पूरी या सफल हुई है, रसीद की जांच करें.

पेमेंट ऑप्शन के उपयोग के आधार पर, डायमंड को आपके अकाउंट में प्रदर्शित होने में कुछ समय लग सकता है. आमतौर पर डायमंड खरीदने के लिए आपके द्वारा उपयोग किए जाने वाले पेमेंट गेटवे के आधार पर कुछ सेकंड से कुछ मिनट तक लग सकते हैं.

अगर डायमंड 20 मिनट के बाद भी आपके खाते में नहीं आए हैं, तो एकबार और खरीद करके देखें:

  1. फिर से "टॉप-अप" बटन दबाएं और कोई अमाउंट चुनें.
  2. जब आप पासवर्ड की आवश्यकता वाले पेज पर पहुँचते हैं, तो किसी भी लेनदेन को पूरा न करें और तुरंत रद्द करें या पिछले पेज के बटन को दबाएं.
  3. जब आप में पेज पर लौटते हैं, तो कृपया 1-2 मिनट प्रतीक्षा करें और Free Fire को रीस्टार्ट करें. डायमंड की मात्रा जल्द ही बढ़ जानी चाहिए.

अगर डायमंड अभी भी आपके अकाउंट में नहीं आते हैं, तो रिक्वेस्ट सबमिट करके हमारे कस्टमर सपोर्ट से संपर्क करें. डायमंड न मिलने पर टिकट सबमिट करने की विधि के लिए आप हमारी गाइड भी पढ़ सकते हैं.

1500005000182.name: [Hindi] डायमंड न मिलने पर टिकेट कैसे सबमिट करें (How to Submit a Ticket for Diamonds Not Received)
1500005000182.title: [Hindi] डायमंड न मिलने पर टिकेट कैसे सबमिट करें (How to Submit a Ticket for Diamonds Not Received)
1500005000182.body:
मिसिंग डायमंड की रिक्वेस्ट सबमिट करने से पहले, सुनिश्चित करें कि आप हमारे गाइड को पढ़ें कि डायमंड न मिलने पर क्या करना चाहिए?

डायमंड न मिलने पर, हमारे कस्टमर सपोर्ट एजेंटों को निम्नलिखित जानकारी की आवश्यकता होगी:

  • प्लेयर ID:

अपनी प्लेयर ID जानने के लिए, बस अपने नाम पर क्लिक करें और आपके इन-गेम नाम के नीचे आपकी ID होगी.

  • इन-गेम नाम:
  • रीजन:
  • पेमेंट रसीद का स्क्रीनशॉट:

पेमेंट रसीद आपके ईमेल पर अपने आप ही भेज दी जाती है और नीचे Google Play रसीद का एक उदाहरण है.

  • Google Play रसीद:

कृपया विलंब से बचने के लिए सभी आवश्यक जानकारी प्रदान करें और सभी आवश्यक जानकारी सबमिट करने के बाद 3 बिज़नेस डे तक लग सकते हैं.

1500004999582.name: [Hindi] अपनी गूगल रसीद कैसे प्राप्त करें (How to Find Your Google Receipt)
1500004999582.title: [Hindi] अपनी गूगल रसीद कैसे प्राप्त करें (How to Find Your Google Receipt)
1500004999582.body:
Google store पर कुछ खरीदने के बाद, आपको एक कन्फर्मेशन ईमेल मिलेगा जिसे आप रसीद के रूप में उपयोग कर सकते हैं. आप इस रसीद पर अपना ऑर्डर नंबर पा सकते हैं.

अगर आपको अपना कन्फर्मेशन ईमेल नहीं मिल रहा, आप ऑनलाइन रसीद प्राप्त लार सकते हैं.

  1. pay.google.com/ पर जाएं और अपने Google account से साइन इन करें.
  2. अपने बायीं तरफ एक्टिविटी पर क्लिक करें.
  3. आपको ट्रांज़ैक्शन हिस्ट्री दिखाई देगी और रसीद ढूंढ लें.

1500004901281.name: [Hindi] रिफंड कैसे लें (How to Make a Refund)
1500004901281.title: [Hindi] रिफंड कैसे लें (How to Make a Refund)
1500004901281.body:
सभी खरीददारी अंतिम और नॉन रिफंडेबल हैं. हालाँकि, हम खरीदे गए डायमंड की गलत मात्रा के लिए 1-बार रिफंड की प्रक्रिया कर सकते हैं. रिफंड के लिए अकाउंट में डायमंड की सटीक संख्या होनी चाहिए.

खरीदे गए डायमंड की गलत मात्रा के रिफंड के लिए रिक्वेस्ट करने के लिए, आपको निम्नलिखित चीजें प्रदान करनी होंगी:

  • प्लेयर ID:
  • इन-गेम नाम:
  • रीजन:
  • पेमेंट रसीद का स्क्रीनशॉट:

कृपया ध्यान दें कि हम खरीदे गए डायमंड की गलत मात्रा के लिए केवल 1-बार रिफंड करेंगे और हमारे पास आगे की प्रतिपूर्ति से इनकार करने का अधिकार होगा. हम कैरियर विक्टिमों को प्रोत्साहित करने की इच्छा नहीं रखते हैं, न ही हम उन खिलाड़ियों को दंडित करने की जो वैध रूप से कभी-कभार ग़लती करते हैं.

सभी आवश्यक जानकारी जमा करने के बाद प्रोसेस के समय में 5 बिज़नेस डे लग सकते हैं.

डिस्क्लेमर: हम रिफंड को अस्वीकार करने का अधिकार रखते हैं और केवल Google Play के माध्यम से की गई खरीदारी का रिफंड कर सकते हैं. ग़लती से खरीदारी की श्रेणी में आने के लिए उसी दिन रिक्वेस्ट करें.

4402486956314.name: BD Region Transfer Guide
4402486956314.title: BD Region Transfer Guide
4402486956314.body:
Case 1: If a players account is supposed to be transferred to BD but still in IND

First Reply Process

1. Verify if an account is in IND server

  • if NO, DENY

2. Inform the user that an in-game mail will be sent to the account within the next 24 hours and simply reply back together with the screenshot of the mail showing the unique code visibly. ( reply using macro:  BD Region transfer - account not transferred (account NOT in 2nd batch list) https://ffsupport.zendesk.com/agent/admin/macros/1260817007170

3. Add the account details (no need to put openID anymore) in the escalation form (transfer to BD tab) for the game team to send the unique code and set 'Action' column to 'Pending'.

Sample of escalated ticket

 

Second Reply Process

1. Check the screenshot and see if the code matches the one in the list; if NO, DENY

2. If screenshot and code matches, update the escalation form 'Action' column to 'For Transfer'. If the user provided the wrong screenshot - inform the user that the request is denied unless he provides the correct unique code sent via in-game mail.

Sample screenshot of in-game mail

3. Reply back to user to inform that his request for transfer has been escalated and may take up to 48 hours. (reply macro: Escalation confirmation (Friday & Saturday) https://ffsupport.zendesk.com/agent/admin/macros/360109076994

 

Case 2: If a players account was transferred to BD but wants to stay in IND

First Reply Process

1. Verify if an account is in BD server

  • if NO, DENY

2. Inform the user that an in-game mail will be sent to the account within the next 24 hours and simply reply back together with the screenshot of the mail showing the unique code visibly. (reply macro: BD Region transfer - user wants to transfer to India) https://ffsupport.zendesk.com/agent/admin/macros/1260817198989

3. Add the account details in the escalation form (transfer to IND tab) for the game team to send the unique code

Second Reply Process

1. Check the screenshot and see if the code matches the one in the list

  • if NO, DENY

2. If screenshot and code matches, update the escalation list 'Action' column to 'For Transfer'

3. Reply back to user to inform that his request for transfer has been escalated and may take up to 48 hours.

4. If user provided the wrong screenshot - inform him request is denied unless he provides the correct unique code sent via in-game mail

1260806636489.name: Types of Ingame Banners
1260806636489.title: Types of Ingame Banners
1260806636489.body:
For INTERNAL use only

 

There are 5 types of ingame banners:

1. Splash banner - pop up when enter the game, usually around 3 banners, max 5

 

2. Announcement banners - can consist of 1 or 2 linked banners under lobby and News section.

When press on lobby banner (1) - redirect to the announcement itself under News tab (2), also possible to put up banner without lobby (1), only under News tab, no limit

3. Store banner - when open Store, max 10 

4. Small banner - in lobby the smallest banners, max 2

5. Overview banner - under Events tab, the biggest size, no limit

 

Splash (1) and announcement (2) can be put up any time, depends on config person

Store (3), small (4) and overview (5) - hardcoded in config, start time in most cases is 5pm local time (for SG and IND, other regions - different timings).

1260805266430.name: Payadmin Guide: How to check CODA transactions
1260805266430.title: Payadmin Guide: How to check CODA transactions
1260805266430.body:
HOW TO CHECK CODA TRANSACTIONS:

Under Filter Tab, select "channel_identifier" and type or choose the appropriate "Channel"

Following our SOP, users must provide the required screenshot for us to process the request, and here are some examples;

 

CODA INDIA 

UPI receipt, search using the transaction ID and Channel "216118 | Coda 3rd party India"

                                                        

PayTM receipt, search using Tax Invoice number and Channel "216118 | Coda 3rd party India"

Net Banking receipt, search using Tax Invoice number and Channel "216118 | Coda 3rd party India"

 

 

CODA BANGLADESH

Bkash receipt, search using the transaction ID and Channel "221118 | Coda 3rd party BD"

 

SPECIAL CASE: MSHOP

Since there is no way for us to differentiate if the top-up is from Coda Website or Mshop (https://gameskharido.in/app), search the Tax Invoice number and Channel "216084 | Coda India" if no record shows.

 

 

NOTES:

  • All Coda transactions (BD and IND) are numeric, do not include any letter.
  • Always search the transaction using Coda 3rd party BD and Coda India as channels.
  • If the user is unable to provide the correct receipt, advise contacting Coda directly.

Examples of wrong receipts:

360049420533.name: Ticket Forms - New Process March UPD
360049420533.title: Ticket Forms - New Process March UPD
360049420533.body:
Ticket Forms (for internal use only)

The new ticket form was released in March 2021.

Our Ticket Form has been updated to better address and cater to our players.

Understanding how Ticket Form works

Now players can submit a request by choosing region (server) first.

We provide EN customer support to the following regions:

- India (set as default)

- Singapore

- Europe

- North America

- USA

- Pakistan

The player is required to provide Free Fire Player ID and Ingame Nickname.

We are limiting our support to important issues as follows:

  • Payment & Missing Items (set as default)

if you purchased an item and didn't receive,

the price of item is showing in the wrong currency/USD,

and/or you didn't receive the Special Airdrop.

  • Game Concerns

Abuse Report

Event Issue (issue with the event itself or unable to access web event)

Technical Issue

  • Negative Diamonds
  • Hacker Report 

 If the issue does not fall under any of the categories listed above, DENY and use the macro “Limited Support”.

Users must file the report correctly and provide all the required information in the ticket form.

 

A. Using the correct Ticket Form – GAME CONCERNS

If the issue is game-related, users must select “Game Concerns” Ticket form.

GAME CONCERNS:

1. Abuse Report (Hack Report)

Required information:

  • Type of cheat/hack used by the suspect
  • Hacker playerID & IGN
  • Video Proof

Example:

The user failed to select the correct issue and filed a Hack report as a Verbal Abuse report and will be denied and we will use the macro "Abuse Report: Incomplete Information".

2. Abuse Report (Verbal Abuse)

Required information:

  • Exact playerID & IGN of the abuser
  • Screenshot of chat

Unfortunately, the verbal abuse did not happen in-game as shown in the screenshot below thus the request will be denied. Reason: We are unable to verify and confirm if the abuser is the owner of the reported account.

3. Event Issue (missing or unable to claim reward)

Required information:

  • Type of event
  • Event Name
  • Screenshot of error

The user submitted the request correctly with ALL the information and will be processed accordingly. The request includes Event Type, Event Name, and screenshot of the error.

4. Event Issue (unable to access Event Page)

Required information:

  • Screenshot of error

The event name is not asked since the screenshot will show what event and more information is provided in the Description.

5. Technical Issue

6. Tournament Issue

This issue is straight forward and the user simply needs to provide the details in the description for us to process.

 

B. Using the correct Ticket Form – APPEALING A BAN

Users appealing a ban must provide all the information required in the form. The form requires a lot of information to put the burden on the user. The logic is that we make it hard for them to file a report so only those who are serious enough to complete all requirements will be entertained.

Required information:

  • Why should we unban your account? Explanation should be typed in the Description/Message of the request.
  • Account details:
    • PlayerID
    • IGN
    • Level
    • Account creation month/Year
    • Guild details
  • Inventory details:
    • Estimated gold and diamonds inside the account
  • Recent Top-up & Receipt
  • Last Login: Before the user realized that account was banned
  • Did you share access to your account with anyone? YES/NO
    • if YES, DENY
  • Did someone access your account without your permission? YES/NO
    • if YES, will need to provide the following:
      • What's your IP Address?
      • Did you report to our Customer Service that your account was hacked? (YES/NO)
      • if YES, will need to provide Ticket no.
    • Did you use any 3rd Party App?
      • if YES, I use third party app, will need to provide the following:
        • Mobile Device Name & Model
        • OS version
        • Name of 3rd Party APP
        • Download page of 3rd party APP
        • Screenshot of APP installed in mobile device
      • If YES, my phone comes with third party app, will need to provide the following:
        • Mobile Device Name & Model
        • OS version
        • Name of 3rd Party APP
        • Screenshot of APP installed in mobile device
      • Screenshot of Ban Message

Example:

User failed to provide the following:

  • Region
  • Guild info
  • Invalid receipt

Skipped the questions about:

  • Account sharing
  • Unauthorized access of account
  • Third-Party APP

Screenshot of Ban message not provided

 

C. Using the correct Ticket Form – ACCOUNT LOSS

Similar to Appealing a ban, the requirements for Account Loss are intentionally increased to filter requests.

  • Account details:
    • PlayerID
    • IGN
    • Level
    • Account creation month/Year
    • Guild details
  • Inventory details:
    • Estimated gold and diamonds inside the account
  • Recent Top-up & Receipt
  • Last Login: Before the user realized that account was banned
  • What's your IP Address?
  • New account details
  • Attachments:
    • Proof FB, VK, or Gmail is permanently deactivated.
    • GP receipt

Example

The user submitted the required information except for the most important detail; New account details & Proof FB is banned.

NOTES:

Required information that we do not need to check:

  1. Guild details can’t be checked in GM tool/backend and only asked to filter the requests.
  2. Inventory details (gold and diamonds)

Account create date = as long as year matches

New account details:

  • Must be level 5 or below
  • Linked to FB, VK or Gmail
  • Same server

If the user submitted all the required information, process the account in accordance with our SOP: https://ffsupport.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/360037874854-SOP-Facebook-account-is-disabled

 

D. Using the correct Ticket Form – PAYMENT & MISSING ITEMS

Reports regarding Payment issues submitted in this ticket form will be processed even if user failed to provide the required information.

Since this issue involves money directly, we shall process requests and simply ask for the missing information.

Select the appropriate macro and edit accordingly

Choose the correct Status then Submit

360040634454.name: Duplicate Airdrop Purchase Compensation FAQ
360040634454.title: Duplicate Airdrop Purchase Compensation FAQ
360040634454.body:
Duplicate Airdrop Purchase Compensation FAQ (For internal use only)

  • Compensation Timeline
    • Timeline: Dec. 23, 2019 - Feb. 12, 2020 (until OB20)
    • It will be a daily compensation. Every day we compensate the players for yesterday. (e.g. On Dec. 30 we compensate the users in Dec. 29 if they are double charged)
    • The first compensation will be on Dec. 24 (next Tue), compensating the users for Dec. 23 (next Monday)
  • Which IAPs will be included in the compensation
    • Special Airdrops
    • Weekly Offer
  • Compensation Logic
    • For users who purchase the IAP for A times but only get the rewards for B times, we will compensate the diamond value of the IAP for A-B times
    • For example, if users purchase a 5.99 USD IAP for 3 times but only get the rewards for 1 time, we will compensate them (3-1)*6*100 = 1,200 diamonds
  • In-game Mail Description

         Title: Compensation for incorrect transaction

         Message: Hi Survivor,\n Please claim your compensation.\n Sorry for the inconveniece\n Free Fire               Operation Team\n

  • How should we deal with the reports before Dec. 22
    • Process as usual

360041051453.name: Gift Me Please CS Guide
360041051453.title: Gift Me Please CS Guide
360041051453.body:
Gift Me Please CS Guide (For internal use only)

Ask for a screenshot fo History instead of asking the usual required information for missing items. If provided already;

1. Check if the user sent a gift in GM tool via "proto.Inventory.AdminGetTransactions"

2. Check if the recipient did not receive the gift via "inventory account get"

3. If the item is missing, escalate the issue and in "Agent comments" provide the following:

  • Exact name of missing item/gift:
  • Date: (gift was sent)
  • Price of item/gift:
  • Recipient of gift: (playerID)

Notes:

  • Gift 1 Get 1 Free only applies to gift sent via Gift Me Please event.
  • Need to be level 10 to sent gift
  • Need to be level 5 to receive a gift
  • If recipient already has the item, diamond royal voucher/s will be given depending on the price of the item
  • All gifts are final & non-refundable

360040459973.name: GP Reviews -  Replies
360040459973.title: GP Reviews -  Replies
360040459973.body:
UI

I understand your sentiment about the new UI and already took note of your feedback. A hotfix was already released yesterday and can refer to this post for more details: https://ffsupport.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/360040458393-OB19-Known-Issues-Hotfix-details

I understand that the new UI seems to be confusing and may take time to get used to. We are currently compiling feedback and rest assured that the management is aware of these sentiments. Thank you and kindly stay tuned for further announcements.

Font

We are aware that some texts especially those with special characters are showing wrongly in-game. Though I can't give a definite time of fix, rest assured that our developers are working to address such issues and recently release a hotfix yesterday. You can refer to this post for more details: https://ffsupport.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/360040458393-OB19-Known-Issues-Hotfix-details

Graphics

Hi, Would you mind submitting a request
and let us know more details of what you didn't like with the graphics. You can submit your feedback by visiting the link below: https://ffsupport.garena.com/

Download failed

You can try the following - Switch on/off flight mode, reset wifi, try different network and restart phone. If the problem persists, please submit a request on the link below;https://ffsupport.garena.com/

360038349074.name: How to "Close" tickets
360038349074.title: How to "Close" tickets
360038349074.body:
To address unnecessary open tickets, it is important that each agent change the ticket status to "Close".

  • Solved tickets can be reopened and updated.
  • Closed tickets are locked. They cannot be reopened or updated in any way.

This status is not available in the drop-down option and can change it to close using tags & triggers.

Simply type "closenow" in Tags box and press enter.

  

Make sure that the tag "closenow" appears inside the box.

Proceed to send your reply but this time, "Submit as Open". The reply will be sent and the status will be set as Closed automatically.

360037874854.name: SOP: Facebook account is disabled
360037874854.title: SOP: Facebook account is disabled
360037874854.body:
Facebook disabled account (for internal use only)

Facebook Disabled Scenarios

If a player reports in only stating that his Facebook account has been disabled, use the macro "Account Loss: FB Disabled" and process as Pending.

However, there are certain scenario's that you may face regarding this issue. Some examples are given below:

If you receive a reply from the user with the following screenshot:

  •  The following screenshot does not prove that the user has contacted FB.

If the user sends in this screenshot as a reply to your 1st message, use the macro "Incomplete Report" and process as Solve.

  •  The following screenshot proves that the user have contacted FB however FB has not denied their request to unsuspend their account. It simply states that his account is disabled and he can contact them using the link provided in the email. Also their email address is not visible in the screenshot.

If the user replies using this screenshot use the macro  "Incomplete Report" and process as Solved.

 

  • The following screenshot proves that the user has contacted FB and they have denied their request to open their account

If the user replies back using this type of screenshot where it is written that FB will not activate their account then use the macro "Account Transfer (need more info)" and process as Pending.

 

  • This following screenshot means that the email address associated with FB has been changed.

If the user replies back using this screenshot use the macro "Incomplete Report" and process the ticket as Solved.

 

 

 

Few Things to Keep in mind while doing FB Disabled Tickets:

 

If a user claims that Facebook denied his request to enable back his/her account, simply ask for proof and will need to provide Facebook email reply as shown below:

1. Verify if the proof is real or not by checking the following:

  • The email address should match the email used in Zendesk request
  • The date in the email should be within close proximity when the user informed us that FB denied his request.

2. Check if the account last login in GM tool:

  • Use this link to convert: https://www.epochconverter.com/
  • The account should have no login record of 30 days or more (this is to ensure that the account is indeed blocked in FB and there is no access).

3. Check if the new account meets the requirement as follows:

  • Lvl 5 and below
  • Recently created (not more than 10 days)
  • Linked to FB or VK
  • The new account must be on the same server

4. Escalate accordingly by filling up this form.

5. Management Verification Process

Check if the FB email matches our records (need to request this information from GOP team).

  • If there is no email record, the transfer is denied
  • If the email does not match, the transfer is denied

360034878274.name: Zendesk Guide: Searching tickets using property keywords
360034878274.title: Zendesk Guide: Searching tickets using property keywords
360034878274.body:
Ticket property keywords (Internal use only)

Zendesk have filters that allow us to query specific information but is limited as shown in the image below.

 

We can use full-text search but the return results will include all the data in Zendesk Support. To search exclusively for ticket data, you can use ticket property keywords. Below are the common/most used property keywords we use to gather data:

Keyword: created

The date, or date and time, the ticket was created. Enter date in yyyy-mm-dd format. Example: created:2019-09-01

Search within a date or time range. Enter times using ISO 8601 syntax. For example, to search for a ticket created between 10:30 a.m. and 12 p.m. (UTC) on August 1, 2019: created>2019-09-01T10:30:00Z created<2019-09-01T12:00:00Z

Keyword: assignee

The assigned agent or other entity, for example, assignee:"Jeremy"

The "me" keyword value allows you to search user properties in tickets where the value is your own user account (as the currently logged in user); assignee:me

Keyword: tags

Tags that have been added to the ticket, for example, tags:ban_appeal

To find tickets that include either of two tags, for example, tags:ban_appeal tags:india

To find tickets that include both tags: tags:"ban_appeal india"

Keyword: has_attachment

You use this keyword to search for tickets that either do or not contain file attachments. There are two valid values for this keyword: true and false.

To search for tickets that contain file attachments, use, has_attachment:true

Application: Our agents are required to reply back to pending tickets after 72 hours. Instead of manually checking pending tickets under your name, you can search them using property keywords.

status:pending assignee:me updated:"yyyy-mm-dd"

360035266353.title: How to check top-up history

Search Payadmin using the externalID: Filter>open_id

Tickets are tagged using "type of problem" and these tags are used to generate reports. To ensure we get more accurate generated reports, agents are required to ensure that tickets are under the correct "type of problem".

Ticket with issues should be edited according to the table below:

Issue description 
Abuse report

Account Loss

Account ban

General inquiry

Wrong server

Google Play not received)

Technical Issue
 hardware and software issues 
Tournament Issue
 tournament related concerns 
Other

360033968174.name: Account Ban Codes
360033968174.title: Account Ban Codes
360033968174.body:
Back End Ban Codes (Internal use only)

 

Code Reason Performance
0 Manual ban by ops team manual ban by ops team
1 Auto ban by Gameserver Accounts banned by this ban reason can ONLY be found in "blacklist info by id 2". All accounts will be marked as ban reason 1.
They are classified by Ban Reason Detail:
Ban Reason detail = 0 means ”None“. A default code.
Ban Reason detail = 1 means "Headshot". An Old hack that modifies every part of the body into "Head" to make a headshot. Currently, Seldom found
Ban Reason detail = 2 means "Modify weapon param". It's for Some old hacks (ban reason 127/132). Currently, seldom found.
Ban Reason detail = 3 means "Ban reason 1011". Game Server use ban reason detail 3 to refer to it.
Ban Reason detail = 4 means "Ban reason 1019~1027". Game Server use ban reason detail 4 to refer to it.
105 Floating hacker can float in the air
106 shoot in Air hacker can shoot in the air
107 Can See Players' Name hacker can see all players' names in his visual angle like all players are in a team
109 Multipled Ammo hacker can fire multiple bullets at a time when shooting
110 Accelerate
(≥5 matches, ban)		 hacker can accelerate the moving and shooting speed. It detects the difference between server time and client time.
when no less than 5 matches detected one day, the account will be banned.
113 Wall Hack hacker can cross the wall and hide in the stone
114 Floating hacker can float in the air
115 Fire Position (≥4 matches, ban) check that fire point is far away from shooter's place and detect more than 5 times
116 Hot Position check that hot point is far away from target player's place and detect more than 5 times
117 Enlarge Player's Model hacker enlarge all player's model and make it easy to find and shoot
118 Auto Aim (≥6 matches, ban) hacker can aim at players automatically
120 No building Collision (≥6 matches, ban) no building collision
121 Max Damage (≥5 matches, ban) Max damage Hack
127 Game var (≥1 match, ban) game var: change some default constant
1002 Enlarge Player's Model hacker enlarge other player's model and make it easy to find and shoot
1005 Hack Fire Position hackers can kill players who are beyond the weapon scale
1006 Reload Speed hacker can increase the speed of reloading and is detected for speed >2 more than 5 times
1007 Bullet Damage Hacker can increase the damage of each bullet and is detected more than 3 times
1008 Sight Mismatch Sight Mismatch, including first-person view, aimlock, xxxxxxxx
1009 Headshot In one day, headshot rate ≥97% and reported as cheaters more than 6 matches And no-iOS device
1010 Headshot2 The Car Head_shots
1011 Hack anti hack Use a hack script to change something in the FF client (often used by wallhack script).
1012 Hack with an APK mod Use a modified APK. The way hackers modify APK leaves a unique signature for us to detect and ban them.
The hacks often remove all buildings to make the wall hack.
1013 gg script wall hack cars kill players ≥ 3 via cars in one match And be reported ≥ 3 in one match And MTP info reason=1 And no-iOS device
1014 Hack anti hack_2 Use hack to change some codes in the FF client. It can detect hackers who escape from 1011.
1015 Mod apk Override the signature detection code. Hack apk which provides this function has a unique APKhash value so that MTP can detect them.
The first hack apk which we found to provide this function is the Aimbot hack.
1016 Mod apk 2 Modify our client. This ban reason detects hackers via one unique value. This value show the core hack logic that a group of hacks use.
1018 Antena hack--replace model files Detect the md5 code of essentail model files to clarify if it's replaced.
The most used hack is Antena View hack.
1019
Mod Hack
(files insertion/modification)
Detect the modification of essential files that our game system uses. The modification logic of ban reason 1019~1024 is similar. What classifies them is specific modification behavior.
Sample Hack:
1019-DHXGRATIS_3DIAS_r, 1020-GameModFF147（DILARANG REUPLOAD)
1021-Vipmod/Free Fire Mod Menu 1.47.x.apk, 1022-Free Fire Mod Menu 1.47.x.apk
1023-Free Fire Mod Menu 1.47.0, 1024-lorazalora
1025-Masterpiece /Mitos (Mod) /Lorazalor, 1027-Mitos (Mod)
1026-Masterpiece
1020
1021
1022
1023
1024
1025
1026
1027
1028 Memory hacking (mod hack) Detects several intentional overcoming and modification behaviors on our game engines and core codes. Those behaviors are dynamically happening in the RAM of devices.
1029 GG-Script hacks Use GG script hacks which need to run via a virtual machine
1030 Masterpiece Hacks. The hack claims itself in application version "the client directly stats it's a modified version from the application information.
currently, we only found this phenomenon from the Masterpiece hacks."
1032 tamper the anti-hack detection results the hackers initially tamper our anti-hack detection results to make them garbled.
Although we don't know the specific hack behavior of each of them, we know they attempt to escape from the anti-hack system.
1033 Insert destructive code modules Detects the insertion behavior of some code modules. Those modules are proven harmful based on the known hacks we got.
Using the Xposed framework to invade our game will also be detected.
2000 Reported as Cheaters Be reported by others as a cheater ≥ 6 Matches one day AND at least 3 Matches are reported abnormally by MTP system
3000 DailyLeeches List
users who team up with hackers ≥ 5 matches per day.

 

MTP anti-hack reason:

360033856554.name: GP Console Guide
360033856554.title: GP Console Guide
360033856554.body:
Replying Google Reviews (Internal use only)

Open GP console
Click on Garena Free Fire to open Dashboard


On Dashboard, click User feedback (bottom left)


It will open a drop-down menu and select Reviews

Filter the reviews to 3 stars and fewer & English

Set the date accordingly

To reply, click on "Reply to this review"

REVIEWS TO REPLY:

Positive comment but 1-2 star rating

Feel free to use the suggested reply/template but make sure you select the most appropriate. For the sample above, the 3rd reply will be the most appropriate since the user downgraded the rating from 2 to 1 star. 

Missing items

Make sure you edit the suggested reply by acknowledging the issue as shown in the reply below.

Hack Report 

Wrong Server

Feedback and Suggestion (detailed feedback and not some random rant)

360034158253.name: Customer Service escalation form
360034158253.title: Customer Service escalation form
360034158253.body:
Escalation Guide for Customer Service Team (for internal use only)

ESCALATION TAB

  • Date - date of escalation (not the ticket date)
  • Agent Name - Customer Service Agent's real name
  • Ticket No. - as shown in Zendesk Support
  • Account details
  • player ID - 6 to 12 digits
  • IGN - exact in-game name as shown in backend
  • region - the correct region not the current region for region transfers

 

  • Issue - general classification of issue or problem as follows:
    • Missing purchase - purchased an item using real money but not received (will require GP receipt)
    • Missing items - items missing from the account, from packages
    • Missing event reward - reward not received after completing the event
    • Account ban
    • Technical issue
    • Wrong server - server was changed
    • Name missing from Leaderboard
  • what to do
    • Missing purchase - credit <insert exact missing purchased item/s>
    • Missing items - credit <insert exact missing item/s>
    • Missing event reward - credit <insert exact missing reward/s>
    • Account ban - n/a
    • Technical issue - <insert exact technical issue, e.g. lag>
    • Wrong server - changed from <insert current region as shown in backend> to <insert new region>
    • Name missing from Leaderboard - add to whitelist
  • GP receipt - required for missing purchases
  • Agent Comments
    • Missing purchase - date of purchase
    • Missing items - indicate the item not receive from packages
    • Missing event reward - indicate the exact event name and duration
    • Account ban - not in blacklist 
    • Technical issue - details of tech issue and troubleshooting steps tried
    • Wrong server - indicate if proof of purchase and ID provided
    • Name missing from Leaderboard - exact win rate as shown in the screenshot
  • status
    • pending - need time to investigate or escalated for further investigation
    • denied - false report or request is rejected
    • solved - request processed
  • SG comments - additional details for CS
  • Date processed - date request was processed by SG team

 

For Account loss, use the Lost Accounts tab instead of Escalation tab.

360033635733.name: Free Fire Bans
360033635733.title: Free Fire Bans
360033635733.body:
CONFIDENTIAL INFORMATION (internal use only) 

Account Bans

This type of ban is due to violation of our Abuse Policy and Terms of Use.

How to check:

  • Search the player id using blacklist info by id
  • If the account is banned manually, it should appear as "True" and can refer to the banReasonDetail for the exact violation.

Payment Bans

This type of ban pertains to payment fraud. In most cases, the user asked for a refund despite getting the items purchased in-game. This type of banned can't be checked in the backend but users are informed of the violation in-game. It also contains the number of diamonds that he or she needs to top up.

If the player account appears in the blacklist with ban details as negative balance as shown below, this ban is permanent.

The account is banned since the user instead of paying back the diamonds, used an exploit to bypass the restriction to access the account. The account is guilty of payment fraud and bug exploit thus it's banned permanently.

360026644533.name: Name missing from Leaderboard
360026644533.title: Name missing from Leaderboard
360026644533.body:
CONFIDENTIAL INFORMATION ( for internal use only)

To prevent cheaters from appearing on our Leaderboard, any user with a win rate of 75% and higher must be screened first.

To check simply asked for a screenshot from the player of his Leaderboard showing his win rate under region tab (as shown in the screenshot below).

Once verified that the win rate is 75% or higher, check via GM tool "stat match history" and key in the following information

  • account_id - player ID
  • match_num - 200
  • region - IND 

Check for headshotCount and headshotKills, if nothing unusual then escalate and put "add to white list" on what to do column. If headshotCount and headshotKills is high, put "for investigation - unusual headshot stats"

TIP: Use CTRL + F and type "headshot" to search

If the account is cleared, the game team will add the user in the whitelist for his name to appear in the leaderboard.

360026357514.title: GOP
360026357514.body:
CONFIDENTIAL INFORMATION (for internal use only)

How to check GP receipt using GOP:

Login to GOP website

Click on Filter tab:

360026025714.name: List of Cause and Effect
360026025714.title: List of Cause and Effect
360026025714.body:
CONFIDENTIAL INFORMATION (internal use only)

Login Issue

  • lost or wrong password - use forgot password in FB
  • account/device ban - check GM tool
  • lost guest account (deleted) - use template (Account Loss - Ban)
  • lost linked account (FB deactivated) - use template 

Diamonds not received (PAYMENT)

  • Payment was declined - ask for a receipt to verify
  • Payment received but diamonds not credited - check if the user bought diamonds in GOP & if diamonds not credited in GM tool
  • Delay/Lag -ask the user to simulate purchase by:
  1. Press the "Top-up" button again and select any amount.
  2. After you enter the page that required the password, don't complete any transaction and press cancel or previous page button immediately.
  3. When you return to the main page, please wait for 1-2 minutes and restart Free Fire. The amount of diamonds should increase soon.

Missing diamonds

  • diamonds used to buy item in-game 
  • diamonds used to buy a gift
  • diamonds were confiscated
  • diamonds missing due to bug

360026173793.name: Freefire Command Queries
360026173793.title: Freefire Command Queries
360026173793.body:
CONFIDENTIAL INFORMATION (internal use only)

account info by Id - find account info using player ID

account info by name - find account info using IGN

Account get openID - check if a guest account or not

blacklist info by id - check ban status

GetTransactionsOfGems - check the purchase of diamonds or top-up history

get pet list - check pets

inventory account wallet - check current coins & diamonds inside the account

inventory account get - check items in the vault

inventory store data - find items purchased

proto.Inventory.AdminGetTransactions - check if the player received the item; e.g. Airdrop 167

stat match history - check match history
